Reference

Package overview

geostan-package

The geostan package.

Spatial autocorrelation

Functions for measuring and visualizing spatial autocorrelation, including regression and observational error model diagnostics

aple()

Spatial autocorrelation estimator

lisa()

Local Moran's I

mc()

The Moran coefficient

me_diag()

Data model diagnostics

moran_plot()

Moran plot

n_eff()

Effective sample size

sp_diag()

Spatial data diagnostics

expected_mc()

Expected value of the residual Moran coefficient.

Models

Model fitting functions and methods

stan_car()

Conditional autoregressive models

stan_esf()

Spatial filtering

stan_glm()

Generalized linear models

stan_icar()

Intrinsic autoregressive models

print(<geostan_fit>) plot(<geostan_fit>) as.matrix(<geostan_fit>) as.data.frame(<geostan_fit>) as.array(<geostan_fit>) residuals(<geostan_fit>) fitted(<geostan_fit>) spatial(<geostan_fit>)

geostan_fit methods

posterior_predict()

Draw samples from the posterior predictive distribution

spatial()

Extract spatial component from a fitted geostan model

Convenience functions

Functions for working with spatial data and geostan models

edges()

Edge list

exp_pars()

Expected dimensions of an eigenvector spatial filter

get_shp()

Download shapefiles

make_EV()

Extract eigenfunctions of a connectivity matrix for spatial filtering

prep_icar_data()

Prepare data for ICAR models

se_log()

Standard error of log(x)

shape2mat()

Create spatial and space-time connectivity matrices

sim_sar()

Simulate spatially autocorrelated data

student_t()

Student t family

waic()

WAIC

Data

ohio

Ohio Presidential election results and county characteristics

sentencing

Florida state prison sentencing counts by county, 1905-1910
